name: chitbox
description: ChitBox Mail Client - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: echo 'Run npm run dev:frontend and npm run dev:backend in separate terminals'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: echo 'Run npm run start:frontend and npm run start:backend in separate terminals'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend

author: ChitBox Team
